results.deck: TimeGate Studios are a development team based in Sugar Land, Texas, who developed the two expansions to F.E.A.R.
results.description:
Overview


TimeGate Studios are a development studio based in Sugar Land, Texas. They have released 7 titles, but most noteably the two expanions (F.E.A.R. : Extraction Point and F.E.A.R. : Perseus Mandate) to the 2005 game, F.E.A.R.
results.name: TimeGate Studios, Inc.

concept.name: Games on Which Comic Books are Based
